title: Buddha No. 1
provenance_text:
Yuichi Inoue [1916-1985], Chigasaki-shi, Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan [1]; purchased from the artist by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was included (no. 172, illustrated in the catalogue) in "The 1961 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961 - January 1962. 
[2]. The painting was purchased by Carnegie Institute from the International. According to the artist, it was his "first painting to be purchased in America." See copies of correspondence with the artist in curatorial file.
